Wellington.The Mall at Wellington Green: The Mall at Wellington Green is a two level super-regional shopping mall in Wellington, Florida. The mall features Dillard's, JCPenney, Macy's, Nordstrom, City Furniture, Ashley Furniture Home Store, Paragon Theaters, and over 170 stores and eateries. As one of the last malls in south Florida and Palm Beach County, it opened in alongside the Mall at Stonecrest in 2001 by Taubman Centers, and was sold to Starwood Retail Partners in 2014.
